channel.title: running on Random Walks
channel.description: Recent content in running on Random Walks

item.title: Running snapshots - Aug 2022
item.description: One day in May, I was returning home from work when I saw a poster for the Seoul Marathon 2022. The event had come and gone, and I had been unaware of it. Seoul Marathon 2022 I started running some time in June this year. I’ve made it a tradition to take a shot of whatever is in front of me when I finish my runs. I don’t think any of these shots are “special” in a visual way.
